General.Name: Mitsib Leasing Public Company Limited
General.Description: Mitsib Leasing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hire purchase and factoring business in Thailand. It provides hire purchase loans for taxis and commercial vehicles; and maintenance services for public transportation and retail loans to customers. In addition, the company offers insurance brokerage services for car, life, fire, accident, travel, and health. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.
